scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-selection:d3 -f umd -n d3 -o build/parcoords.js -- index.js
scripts.copywidget: browserify build/parcoords.js > build/parcoords-bundle.js && uglifyjs build/parcoords-bundle.js -c -m -o build/parcoords.min.js && cp build/parcoords-bundle.js ../inst/htmlwidgets/parcoords.js
